# Services Offered

I am available to help both individuals and companies achieve their data-driven goals. My services include:

-   Career consulting (portfolio review, interview prep, resume writing)
-   Data analysis mentoring (Beginner to Intermediate R, Python)
-   Data science (visualizations, code review and model optimization)
-   AI training and prompt engineering
